column5: Hi all  Picked up my Islander Steelheader today(silver) and I think I have a deal for 2 rods tomorrow (12'9 Matrix & a 14' Raven im8). Perfect timing for the mild weekend.  Now all I have to do is learn how to cast.  Anyone else steelheading this weekend?  Chris
steelheadings been pretty slow everywhere. most places are frozen shut
